ui.description: Select the programming language for syntax highlighting
Select a file from /reuse/code/ (includes subdirectories)

defaultItem.text: This text will appear when conditions are met.

fields.name: requireBothConditions

ui.description: When true, both condition and language conditions must be satisfied
Optional text to show when conditions are not met

Select a file from /reuse/snippets/ (includes subdirectories)
